resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">Porzime adiuto, o pelegrina bella.<span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'MS Mincho';">  / <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">Se no[n] m’aiuti, io languisco (ch)e moro, / O caro thesoro !
resource.chars: Porzime adiuto, o pelegrina bella.  / Se no[n] m’aiuti, io languisco (ch)e moro, / O caro thesoro !
